Module com.example.filemanager
Package com.example.filemanager.logic

Class FUtil

java.lang.Object
com.example.filemanager.logic.FUtil
public class FUtil extends Object
A class with static functions focused on logic for working with files.

      public FUtil()

  • Method Details

    • copyFile

      public static boolean copyFile​(File source, File destination)
      A helper method used to copy file. Should only be used through commands.
      Parameters:
      source - source of the file
      destination - the name to copy into
      Returns:
      success

    • deepCopy

      public static void deepCopy​(File source, File destination) throws DuplicateFileException
      Makes deep copy of source to destination. Skips failed files and continues at work.
      Parameters:
      source - the source to copy
      destination - the destination to copy to
      Throws:
      DuplicateFileException - to inform of failed copies

    • deepDelete

      public static void deepDelete​(File file) throws DeleteFileException
      Deletes a file and, if file is directory, all its contents. Continues even on fail and only reports error at the end.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to delete
      Throws:
      DeleteFileException - when some files fail to be deleted.

    • inventUniqueName

      public static File inventUniqueName​(File file)
      Returns a new file with name which doesn't exist yet. Example: "some-file.txt" -> "some-file copy.txt"
      It's possible the name with incremented name already exists too, so recursion is necessary.
      Parameters:
      file - the file name to turn into something unique
      Returns:
      a new File with unique name similar to original

    • getFileType

      public static String getFileType​(File file)
      Returns the file extension. First checks for special types like directory and hidden before checking actual extension.
      Parameters:
      file - the file
      Returns:
      the type

    • getHomePath

      public static String getHomePath()
      Returns string path to home directory on given machine
      Returns:
      the path

    • getHomeDirectory

      public static File getHomeDirectory()
      Returns directory of the system home
      Returns:
      the directory of "user.home" on given system

    • optimizeSizeFormat

      public static String optimizeSizeFormat​(long byteSize)
      Transform numerical size in bytes into minimal string representation
      Parameters:
      byteSize - the size in bytes
      Returns:
      the optimal string representation

    • simplifyDateFormat

      public static String simplifyDateFormat​(long epochTime)
      Writes epoch time as a string date
      Parameters:
      epochTime - milliseconds since epoch
      Returns:
      yyyy/mm/dd formatted date

    • simplifyDateTime

      public static String simplifyDateTime​(String time)
      Clears ISO time of T, Z and decimal part
      Parameters:
      time - the string iso time
      Returns:
      simplified time

    • storeFileToClipboard

      public static void storeFileToClipboard​(File... files)
      Stores files to clipboard
      Parameters:
      files - the files to store

    • storeTextToClipboard

      public static void storeTextToClipboard​(String text)
      Stores text to clipboard
      Parameters:
      text - the text to store
